name: Blizzard! Part II: Jihadi Moon (C64) Commodore 64
name_original: Blizzard! Part II: Jihadi Moon (C64) Commodore 64
description:
The 2020 Unofficial Commodore Sequel to Blizzard! Part I: Commando Libya

v1.0 NTSC/PAL

Fe Fi Fo Fum. Sequelled off the C64 classic and now back and toned in sparkling moonlight.
